aboutMeSection.title: About me
aboutMeSection.content:
I am a software developer mainly focused on web development, with experience in other fields like server infrastructure, administration and security. Right now I am living in Spain.

More comfortable with languages like Typescript (including Angular), Go and Java.

Other skills like Version control (Git), SQL databases (PostgreSQL), containers (Docker), DevOps(GitLab CI), UNIX-like systems (including Linux and macOS), Networking Ipv4\/6, TCP\/IP and other protocols.

projects.title: Youtube Playlist
projects.description: Get a playlist from Youtube api using Angular.

projects.title: Goroutines with Web scraping
projects.description: Web scraping demo with Go using goroutines and semaphore limit.

projects.title: Business card reader
projects.description: Demo of Business card reader with angular and azure OCR api.

projects.title: Photo organizer
projects.description: Using the metadata information, organizes the files in the destination folder with the syntax year_number/month_number.month_text/ ... files

projects.title: Siete y media
projects.description: Popular Spanish card game that consists of approaching 7.5 points without going over.

projects.title: POS - Supermarket
projects.description: Point of sale for supermarket with administration of employees, items and sales.

projects.title: Heroe del teclado
projects.description: Spanish version of the game "guitar hero", with a ranking system and a list of songs to play.
